Name: Fantasy battle islands
About the game: Let's go on an adventure on our little island. We capture enemy islands and increase our own. We place different types of troops on the island and fight with a stronger enemy. Go through the most unusual levels and locations with your battle island. Defeat strong bosses, create the strangest shaped island. Try a variety of combat mechanics. Learn to defeat a variety of monsters and heroes. Lead your island to victory! Correct forms of the island give additional bonuses Beware of mines Remove part of the island if you need money or can't sail Heroes will defend their island until their last breath
